languages.text: {n}Равор кривится и касается виска.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы бы это... спросили того, кто болтать мастак. Хоть ту же Толиман, нового Мастера вокса. А я не по болтовне спец, а по системам управления. Давайте каждый своим заниматься будет".

{n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор кривится и касается виска.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы бы это... спросили того, кто болтать мастак. Хоть ту же Толиман, нового Мастера вокса. А я не по болтовне спец, а по системам управления. Давайте каждый своим заниматься будет".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor winces and brushes for his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But go find a talker. Like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I'm not a chatterbox, I deal with navigation. Let each of us do what we do best."

{n}Ravor winces and brushes for his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But go find a talker. Like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I'm not a chatterbox, I deal with navigation. Let each of us do what we do best."

{n}Ravor winces and brushes for his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I'm not a chatterbox, I deal with navigation. Let each of us do what we do best."

{n}Ravor winces and brushes for his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I'm not a chatterbox, I deal with navigation. Let each of us do what we do best."

{n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."

{n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."

languages.text: {n}雷沃脸上的肌肉抽搐着，揉着太阳穴。{/n}“船长老大，我无意冒犯……但你最好去和那些喜欢聊天的人多聊聊，像新任音阵大师托里曼这种。我这个人嘴笨，我只知道怎么把船开到该去的地方。谁擅长啥，就让他们干啥吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃脸上的肌肉抽搐着，揉着太阳穴。{/n}“船长老大，我无意冒犯……但你最好去和那些喜欢聊天的人多聊聊，像新任音阵大师托里曼这种。我这个人嘴笨，我只知道怎么把船开到该去的地方。谁擅长啥，就让他们干啥吧。”

languages.text: {n}Ravor se estremece y se frota la sien.{/n} «L{mf|ord|ady} Capi, con el debido respeto... sería mejor que busque a otra persona a la que se le dé bien conversar, como Toliman, la nueva maestra de vocos. No soy muy de hablar: me limito a llevar la nave adonde debe ir. Es mejor dejar que la gente se ocupe de lo que sabe hacer».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor se estremece y se frota la sien.{/n} «L{mf|ord|ady} Capi, con el debido respeto... sería mejor que busque a otra persona a la que se le dé bien conversar, como Toliman, la nueva maestra de vocos. No soy muy de hablar: me limito a llevar la nave adonde debe ir. Es mejor dejar que la gente se ocupe de lo que sabe hacer».

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは顔をしかめ、こめかみをさすった。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、失礼ですが…話がうまい相手をを探したほうがいいでしょう。新しいヴォクス・マスターの、トリマンのような。私はあまりおしゃべりなタイプじゃないんですよ。船を必要な場所に運ぶだけです。得意なことに専念させるのが一番ってもんですよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは顔をしかめ、こめかみをさすった。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、失礼ですが…話がうまい相手をを探したほうがいいでしょう。新しいボクスマスターの、トリマンのような。私はあまりおしゃべりなタイプじゃないんですよ船を必要な場所に運ぶだけです。得意なことに専念させるのが一番ってもんですよ」

languages.text: {n}Ravor zuckt zusammen und reibt sich die Schläfe.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, ich will nicht respektlos sein ... Aber Ihr solltet Euch jemanden suchen, der sich auf Smalltalk versteht ... Toliman zum Beispiel, die neue Voxmeisterin. Ich selbst bin nicht sonderlich gesprächig. Ich bringe nur das Schiff an sein Ziel. Jeder sollte tun, was er am besten kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor zuckt zusammen und reibt sich die Schläfe.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, ich will nicht respektlos sein ... Aber Ihr solltet Euch jemanden suchen, der sich auf Smalltalk versteht ... Toliman zum Beispiel, die neue Voxmeisterin. Ich selbst bin nicht sonderlich gesprächig. Ich bringe nur das Schiff an sein Ziel. Jeder sollte tun, was er am besten kann."

languages.text: {n}Ravor grimace en se massant les tempes.{/n} « Sauf votre respect, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}... Vous feriez mieux d'aller trouver quelqu'un de plus doué pour ce genre de conversation, comme Toliman, la nouvelle maîtresse-vox. Je ne suis pas du genre bavard. Je me contente de guider ce vaisseau jusqu'à sa destination. Autant que chacun s'en tienne à ce qu'il fait de mieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor grimace en se massant les tempes.{/n} « Sauf votre respect, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}... Vous feriez mieux d'aller trouver quelqu'un de plus doué pour ce genre de conversation, comme Toliman, la nouvelle maîtresse-vox. Je ne suis pas du genre bavard. Je me contente de guider ce vaisseau jusqu'à sa destination. Autant que chacun s'en tienne à ce qu'il fait de mieux. »

languages.text: {n}Ravor, suratını ekşitip şakaklarını ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, saygısızlık etmek istemem ama yeni Voks Üstadımız Toliman gibi daha hoşsohbet birisini bulsanız daha iyi olmaz mı? Konuşkan biri sayılmam, sadece gemiyi gitmesi gereken yere götürürüm. En güzeli herkes kendi işine baksın."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor winces and rubs his temple.{/n} "Lord Cap'n, I mean no disrespect... But you'd do better to find someone with a knack for conversation, like Toliman, the new Vox Master. I ain't the talkin' type, I just get the ship where she needs to go. Best let folk stick to what they do best."

Konuşkan biri sayılmam, sadece gemiyi gitmesi gereken yere götürürüm. En güzeli herkes kendi işine baksın."
